mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RN FROM (SELECT BLACK_ID, USER_ID_FK, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_PATH, REASON, USER_DT FROM BLACKLIST, USERS WHERE USER_ID = USER_ID_FK AND CANCEL_DT IS NULL AND USER_ID_FK LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' ORDER BY USER_ID_FK) A) WHERE RN >= (#{page} - 1) * #{pageSize} + 1 AND RN <= #{page} * #{pageSize}
